title: Percent water use for various purposes

content.question: Which of the following best represents the percent of water that is used for various purposes worldwide?

choices.label: Agriculture Industrial and Municipal Residential and Commercial 10% 20% 70%
Agriculture Industrial and Municipal Residential and Commercial 20% 30% 50%
Agriculture Industrial and Municipal Residential and Commercial 30% 50% 20%
Agriculture Industrial and Municipal Residential and Commercial 50% 10% 40%
Agriculture Industrial and Municipal Residential and Commercial 70% 20% 10%

content.answer: Agriculture Industrial and Municipal Residential and Commercial 70% 20% 10%

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
